name: Life In The Analog Age: Rainy Day
name_original: Life In The Analog Age: Rainy Day
description:
Control:

  • Z / J  = A button (confirm)
  • K / X = B button (not used)
  • Enter = Start button (pause/options)
  • Shift = Select button (inventory)

Can you survive one rainy afternoon trapped indoors in 1984? No cell phones... no Gameboys... no INTERNET?!

  • all ages
  • light RPG/puzzler
  • packed with nostagia
  • short enough to finish during a lunch break

More Life In The Analog Age

This was created in GBStudio 1.2.1. to play in browser, emulator, and real Gameboy/Gameboy Color hardware.

Thank you for your support!

All characters, graphics, concept and music ©2021 Gabe Swarr

version: 5.3
